short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically activates AddressTools on Salesforce pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For use with AddressTools Premium in Salesforce Classic. Install the browser addon in Chrome or Microsoft Edge with an active AddressTools Premium license to gain interactive functionality.
